channel.title: Portalunleashed - work so far. (rate)
channel.description:
First of all: I didn't create the template, but modified it a bit and added some other things to it.. Thanks to styleshout for the template. I'll probably make my own sometime, but for now I'll be using this.
basically just post what you think of it, the backend was all done by me except for a regexp pattern I borrowed from php.net. If you spot any bugs please tell me, I can't find everything ;)
Features so far: - AJAX: Login, Register, Shoutbox, Logging out. - Admin: Disabling ANY module (login, register, shoutbox), adding any custom shoutbox you may have made.. - Admin: Force-login if login is disabled, MUST be admin to login from [url=http://www.rs2reborn.net/port/admin.php?action=forcelogin]there[/url]. - I think I have all variables sanitized, shouldn't be vunerable to sql injection. ( Still have yet to test it more against this. ) - Some hidden modules in admin area not in plain sight since still being worked on.
Hopefully I think of more module ideas. Soon to come as well: Who's online, etc.
http://www.rs2reborn.net/port

item.title: Portalunleashed - work so far. (rate)
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:215033”][quote author=Hidendra link=topic=282634.msg2294920#msg2294920 date=1214354723]

To be honest, I don’t like the green bg/black text ‘loading’ messages. It just clashes with the entire design.

Any suggestions for a color that would go better with it?
[/quote]
Light grey background with black font? Have an experiment with darkish colours that go with the theme.[/quote]
Alright, I’ll try that out sometime… As well, I got around to converting the shoutbox to AJAX style… Changes take effect immediately and I added a ‘Reload’ button to instantly reload without refreshing… A little bit more security in how the shoutbox works, as well.
I’ll make a auto refresh soon to automatically reload the shoutbox area if it’s in there, couldn’t be bothered at the moment.

Read full topic

item.title: Portalunleashed - work so far. (rate)
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Well- for the shoutbox I have this planned for it:

  • Make a parser for images (I made a old one I used on the old old version of rs2reborn where I had made a pm system but now I can just use the parser I used on that with this of course…)
  • Automatically refresh every 5-10 secs (the internal window, AJAX style so no “loading…”
  • Basically instant post without even saying posted, just refreshing the display used for the messages (like IRC I guess).

I’ll change the colors around sometime, the way the shoutbox is showing messages was made very quickly and definitely isn’t a final version of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Portalunleashed - work so far. (rate)
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

First of all: I didn’t create the template, but modified it a bit and added some other things to it… Thanks to styleshout for the template. I’ll probably make my own sometime, but for now I’ll be using this.

basically just post what you think of it, the backend was all done by me except for a regexp pattern I borrowed from php.net.
If you spot any bugs please tell me, I can’t find everything

Features so far:

  • AJAX: Login, Register, Shoutbox, Logging out.
  • Admin: Disabling ANY module (login, register, shoutbox), adding any custom shoutbox you may have made…
  • Admin: Force-login if login is disabled, MUST be admin to login from there.
    • I think I have all variables sanitized, shouldn’t be vunerable to sql injection. ( Still have yet to test it more against this. )
  • Some hidden modules in admin area not in plain sight since still being worked on.

Hopefully I think of more module ideas.
Soon to come as well: Who’s online, etc.

http://www.rs2reborn.net/port
